name: ²Catz
description:
I have two British Short Hair Cats - this game gamifies their fun and complex relationship. Bobbix hates Gsech but she also loves cookies! See them on the Gram here: https://www.instagram.com/bogusiathecat/

Created for the Mini Jam 127 Cats² in March 202 using Unity, Visual Studio Community Edition and Aseprite.

Importantly these cats are square ²Catz and following the colour scheme (except for the real colours and images of the cats and cookies).

 ** PRO GAMER TIP: Feed the square cookies (looks like bread/toast) to Bobbix to apply a score multiplier! But look out as Gsech will try his best to hoover up all the treats for himself and scare away the poor Bobbix - try to distract him to feed Bobbix da cookies **

If there was a little more time left in the Jam the next steps would be:

- Adding a background soundtrack.
-Some basic animations for the Cookies.
-Some additional gameplay.

Enjoy! Thanks for taking the time.
